name: Stonks (Dangermau5, Taylor Made)
description:
Short GME! In this game you play as a professional stonk trader in the situation of a lifetime. You've just shorted GME, but the value keeps going up - you can't afford this! 

Do whatever you can to run the stock into the ground! Your friendly AI assistant Stonkbot will gladly help you in your endeavours - no task is too big for it! Their failure is your victory.  Just click the buttons and stuff will happen.

Just try not to get too stressed. 

Or happy.

... Or drunk.

----

Made during 72 hours for the Wowie Jam 3.0

Adam Hitchen: Design, Programming, UI

https://dangermau5.itch.io/

Phil Taylor: Art, Audio, Design, Programming

https://taylor-made.itch.io/

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/jazz-comedy by Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)
